title: Authorization Request Resource
description: Schema for authorization request data object.

type.description: The type of the resource object.

attributes.description: The attributes of the authorization request.

requestType.description: The type of the authorization request.

status.description: The status of the authorization request.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the authorization request was created.

validTo.description: The date and time when the authorization request is valid to.

relationships.description: The related entities of the authorization request (persons and organizations).

resourceMeta.description: Additional meta-information related to the resource. Most of this information is used for informational purposes.

requestedFromName.description: The name of the organization or person who the authorization document is requested from.

requestedForMeteringPointId.description: The unique identifier of the metering point associated with the authorization document.

requestedForMeteringPointAddress.description: The address of the metering point associated with the authorization document.

supplierContractName.description: The unique name of a supplier contract associated with the authorization document.
